Macros

#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_DEV_PER_PORT_MAX   (2U)
 Max devices that can be associated with a single VIP port.
 
#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_DEFAULT   ((UInt32) 0xFFFFFFFFU)
 Value to use, when it is needed to apply device specific default setting value.
 
#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_NO_CHANGE   ((UInt32) 0xFFFFFFFEU)
 Value to use, when it is needed to NOT change a device specific setting value.
 
#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_GPIO_NONE   ((UInt32) 0xFFFFFFFFU)
 Value to use, when there no GPIO is used for device reset.
 
#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_DLY_REG   (0xABCD)
 Video sensor dummy register used for introducing delay in sensor.
 
#define BSP_VID_SENSOR_DLY_REG_MASK   (0xFF00)
 Video sensor dummy register mask.

#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_FLIP_PARAMS   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x07U)

#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_EXP_PARAMS   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x08U)
 IOCTL to set the sensor exposure parameters, currently only change in exposure time is supported. More...
 
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_GAIN_PARAMS   (BSP_VID_SENSOR_IOCTL_BASE + 0x09U)
 IOCTL to set the sensor gain parameters, currently only change in analog gain is supported. More...
 
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_GET_EXP_RATIO_PARAMS
 IOCTL to set the exposure ratio from the sensor, Supported only for the sensor which supports WDR merged output or multi exposure output. More...
 
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_WDR_PARAMS
 IOCTL to set the WDR params, Supported only for the sensor which supports WDR merged output or multi exposure output Currently supports only WDR Enable/disable parameter. More...
 
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_GET_DCC_PARAMS
 IOCTL to get the DCC params, Used to get the DCC parameters like camera id, pointer to the bin file, size of the bin file etc. Supported only for the sensor which supports DCC. More...
 
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_GET_OFFSET_PARAMS
 IOCTL to get WDR Offsets for the Line Interleaved mode. More...
 
#define IOCTL_BSP_VID_SENSOR_SET_FPS

enum  Bsp_VidSensorWdrMode {
  BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_DISABLED = 0x0, BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_1PASS = 0x1, BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_2PASS = 0x2, BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_2PASS_LINE_INTERLEAVED = 0x4,
  BSP_VID_SENSOR_WDR_MODE_MAX = 0x5
}
 Enum for specifying WDR mode. Used only for the sensors supporting WDR. Typically used for getting correct DCC file for given WDR mode Also sensor could be configured differently for different WDR mode. More...
